oakIntroDialogue:
Hello there!
Welcome to the&cworld of #MON!

My name is OAK!
People call me&cthe #MON PROF!

This world is
inhabited by&ccreatures called&c#MON!

For some people,
#MON are&cpets. Others use&cthem for fights.

This is my grand-
son. He's been&cyour rival since&cyou were a baby.

That's right! I
remember now! His&cname is <rivalname>!

Your very own
#MON legend is&cabout to unfold!

A world of dreams
and adventures&cwith #MON&cawaits! Let's go!
